channel.title: Anyone else gets this?
channel.description:
You know the peice of code in client.java that states when the number exceeds the amount of players(max) you have declared in playerHandler.java it will disconnect any other players and return a returnCode.
Does that actualy work for you, and DOESN'T cause errors? Everytime i set it at 15 players, i get an error in playerHandler processing, once the 15 players has been breached(reached, etc). It's just ridicioulous in one day getting 500 char files?? I only want 15 people to be on my server, not 40 or 50 at 1 time! I can't handle that. So if anyone knows how to fix it? I would really appreciate it!

item.title: Anyone else gets this?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Only 6 people on, waiting for it to reach 15.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else gets this?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Lol, that sucks. I have DSL Lite, the max speed is about 1600Kb on a router, 2200Kb on direct connection. I wanted to get 6.0 but they don’t have it in the area i live in, If i did i would be at 16mb + =). But noo gay bellsouth people!

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else gets this?
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

I get 22 players usually when its on it’s own on no list. I get 40 when its on status list. After 50 my internet goes away…

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else gets this?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I don’t post on mopar status list, lol. I still get average 40 to 50 players, and sometimes you get like 2 or 3, which is practically nothing, no point in putting it online.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else gets this?
item.dc:creator: @jags_4 jags 4
item.description:
@jags_4 wrote:

Instead of posting your server on mopar server status page, simply post it on codefasga instead! I find this reduces population, but you still get a decent amount of players.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else gets this?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

If this work, you will be my second lover <3!

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else gets this?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

In process put

if(playerId > 15) { disconnected = true; }

That thought just rushed into my head this exact moment, so I have no idea if it will work.

But it looks like it will.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else gets this?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Eh, well i’ll try to fix it, because damn bro too much people log on. Thanks for at least replying.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else gets this?
item.dc:creator: @phoenix55 phoenix55
item.description:
@phoenix55 wrote:

i think all servers have overpopulation issues. When the player handler thing actually works i think thats what creates "null"s which lag the server just as much if not more than a regualr player. I bet someone is currently working on this issue, its onyl a matter of time before its fixed.

Read full topic
